translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 布団の中からもぞりと出た手が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A hand wriggled out from under the futon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジーの大きな手に絡んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and entwined itself with Gandhi's large hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガンジー様の……心の一部に、してください」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please let me become a part of Lord Gandhi's heart..."
"Without being separated...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこまでも……死地であっても、共に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: forever... even in the face of death, together..."
"...Understood. I will keep it in mind."
"...Hehe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオルは安らぎ、満たされた表情で眠りに就いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaoru fell asleep with a peaceful and fulfilled expression.
"I will become stronger!"
"I will make Gandhi obey me!"
"I will cry and shout!"
"And so, through sincere negotiation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜カオルを呼ぶのに成功したのであった！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: tonight I succeeded in calling Kaoru!"
"Gahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ……もう、仕方ありませんね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa... well, it can't be helped,
Mr. Rance is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむうむ。やれればなんでもいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, it doesn't matter what it is, as long as we can do it.
Come now.
"Before that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 応じますから、ガンジー様を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since I will comply, please refrain from doing anything

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困らせるような事は控えて頂けますね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that would trouble Lord Gandhi, okay?"
"Oh, I won't do that, I won't.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、カオルとは久しぶりだからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, it's been a while since Kaoru and I got together.
Let’s go all out!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは服をすぽぽぽーんと脱ぎ捨てた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance quickly stripped off his clothes with a woosh.
"Alright then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふ。少しは保つようになりましたか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe. Are you lasting a little better now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しゅるりと衣擦れの音を立てて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a rustling sound of fabric,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオルも服を脱ぎ落とす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaoru also slipped off her clothes.
"Ugh, you’re noisy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の俺は無敵なのだ。さあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am invincible right now. So...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがカオルの腰を抱え、抱き寄せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance took Kaoru by the waist and pulled her close.
"Hmm... A kiss?
Indeed, something feels a little different...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、応じようとしたカオルの動きを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaoru’s movement just as she was about to respond,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力強いノックが遮った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was interrupted by a strong knock.
"Hello? Is Lord Rance there?
"Huh? Who is it? Buzz off."
"It's me, Lord Rance. The night has grown late.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一献どうだと思ってな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought maybe we could have a drink."
(As expected... Lord Gandhi...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アホか。夜に俺様がヒマなわけがあるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you stupid? As if I’d have free time at night.
Now go away...
"...No, wait a minute?"
*Twinkle*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの目が邪悪に光った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance’s eyes gleamed evilly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「帰れというところだが、仕方ないな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was about to tell you to go away, but it can’t be helped!
Alright, shall we drink!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言いながら、ランスは手をもぞもぞ動かし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he said this, Rance began to fidget with his hands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオルの身体をまさぐり始める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: starting to explore Kaoru's body.
(No way...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白い肴があるのだ。がははは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've got an interesting snack here. Gahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう？　ならば失礼するか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Then I’ll be rude and come in."
"...I understand very well."
"Huh?"
"And now, take this...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 電光石火の早業でカオルはランスを締め落とし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With lightning-fast skill, Kaoru choked Rance unconscious,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドに放り捨てると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then tossed him onto the bed,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

*Twinkle*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの目が邪悪に光った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance’s eyes gleamed evilly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「帰れというところだが、仕方ないな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was about to tell you to go away, but it can’t be helped!
Alright, shall we drink!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言いながら、ランスは手をもぞもぞ動かし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As he said this, Rance began to fidget with his hands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオルの身体をまさぐり始める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: starting to explore Kaoru's body.
(No way...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「面白い肴があるのだ。がははは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I've got an interesting snack here. Gahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう？　ならば失礼するか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Then I’ll be rude and come in."
"...I understand very well."
"Huh?"
"And now, take this...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 電光石火の早業でカオルはランスを締め落とし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With lightning-fast skill, Kaoru choked Rance unconscious,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドに放り捨てると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then tossed him onto the bed,
